text: A highrise in downtown L.A., framed tall against the mountains. People stream out of the front door, leaving work.
In the near darkness of basement, a security guard makes his way into an inner cellar. His flashlight finds a man in work clothes bent over a panel, his back to the light.
Hey. This area's restricted. The man doesn't look around. We can just almost see his face as he talks.

Out of his hand drops the work order. He slumps over. Dies. HOWARD FISK takes off the guard's hat. Dripping knife aside, he is an ordinary-looking man. want you to help me get it

holds onto the screwdriver. Liquid sprays down on him. He coughs, reaches out, grabs a hydraulic line and pulls himself away fromthe spray. His shoes skid over pavement at 50 mp.h. on the back of the airport vehicle, is relieved when he sees Jack surface inside the bus. He gives a thunmbs-up sign to Jack and his vehicle falls back.
